page.title: 14GREATFIELD LIBRARY,HULL
page.content: Greatfield library is situated in the shopping centre on Greatfield Estate. A class of nine year old children from Oldfleet Primary School visited the library. "The assistant told us that 2,500 adults and 1,692 children are library members.Every week nearly 2,000 people use the library.There are 20,000 books all together. They showed us how to look after books.Nearly 30 books a week get damaged or lost.They gave us some cards to look up books in the index.The books are books to look at and you can not take them out. Out of 32 children,18 used the library about once a week.At the library they have storytime and pictures for the children to colour" Amanda Holbrook.
